title: Qualiss Watch Face
summary: Interactive Watch Face with Weather, Steps, Calendar and Apps widgets
description: Qualiss Watch Face for Android Wear!Advanced interactivity with awesome customization features for Android Wear 1.x and Android Wear 2.0!Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!Use as Standalone app with Complications and add additional feature with companion app!Watch Face Features:- Choose design, hands and background color- Choose 4 different ambient modes- Choose between 3 hand types- Choose widget for 3 dialers- App shortcuts a touch away- Save color presets- Display watch battery- Display handheld battery- Display weather with beautiful icons- Display Google Fit Steps- Display meetings number- Display AM/PM- Display digital time and second time zone- Ticking or sweeping second hand- Hide outer bezel- Advanced Interactivity:	- Touch center to open Interactivity Wheel	- Touch left or right arrows to change dialers information	- Assign app shortcuts!	- Touch Speaker Icon to toggle mute/unmute on the phone	- Touch Center to close Interactivity Wheel	- Touch Steps, Weather or Meetings to open respective apps!	- Touch Second time to change between Digital and Analog	- Touch small dialer to change informationThe SETTINGS of the watch face are located in the Android Wear App of your handheld device.Press the Gear Icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will open!!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 AND GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS)IMPORTANT: Weather will display "N/A" after first install until you set you preferred weather type - Manual or Automatic! If you don't get any weather information please use "Refresh Weather" button.IMPORTANT: Toggle mute/unmute phone is designed to reflect the current state on the phone â€“ please be aware that due to various reasons (watch has disconnected) this function may not work so please always reassure that your phone has been muted by checking it physically.Compatibility:- LG Watch Sport, LG Watch Style, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch Urbane, LG G Watch Urbane 2, LG G Watch R, Moto 360 and Moto 360 2, Fossil Q Founder, Tag Heuer Connected- ASUS ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch- MK Access, Nixon The Mission, Polar M600, New Balance RunIQ, Fossil Q, Casio Watches- Any round or square Android Wear devices up-to 640x640px resolution- NOT compatible with Gear S, Gear S2, Gear S3 and any Tizen watchYou must have Android Wear app installed on your device. In order to use automatic weather you should have location turned on!Steps will start counting after midnight! Please allow it to go past midnight to get steps count! Tapping interactions will only be available if your watch is updated to the latest version of Android Wear (v1.3)!Don't forget to check our other watches! :)https://goo.gl/Tr3kjlIf you don't like Qualiss Watch Face please refund or ask for refund. descriptionHTML:
Qualiss Watch Face for Android Wear!
Advanced interactivity with awesome customization features for Android Wear 1.x and Android Wear 2.0!

Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

Use as Standalone app with Complications and add additional feature with companion app!


Watch Face Features:
- Choose design, hands and background color
- Choose 4 different ambient modes
- Choose between 3 hand types
- Choose widget for 3 dialers
- App shortcuts a touch away
- Save color presets
- Display watch battery
- Display handheld battery
- Display weather with beautiful icons
- Display Google Fit Steps
- Display meetings number
- Display AM/PM
- Display digital time and second time zone
- Ticking or sweeping second hand
- Hide outer bezel


- Advanced Interactivity:
- Touch center to open Interactivity Wheel
- Touch left or right arrows to change dialers information
- Assign app shortcuts!
- Touch Speaker Icon to toggle mute/unmute on the phone
- Touch Center to close Interactivity Wheel
- Touch Steps, Weather or Meetings to open respective apps!
- Touch Second time to change between Digital and Analog
- Touch small dialer to change information

The SETTINGS of the watch face are located in the Android Wear App of your handheld device.
Press the Gear Icon over the watch face preview and the settings screen will open!


!! NOT FOR SAMSUNG GEAR S2 AND GEAR S3 !! (running Tizen OS)


IMPORTANT: Weather will display "N/A" after first install until you set you preferred weather type - Manual or Automatic! If you don't get any weather information please use "Refresh Weather" button.

IMPORTANT: Toggle mute/unmute phone is designed to reflect the current state on the phone – please be aware that due to various reasons (watch has disconnected) this function may not work so please always reassure that your phone has been muted by checking it physically.

Compatibility:
- LG Watch Sport, LG Watch Style, Huawei Watch, LG G Watch Urbane, LG G Watch Urbane 2, LG G Watch R, Moto 360 and Moto 360 2, Fossil Q Founder, Tag Heuer Connected
- ASUS ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Sony SmartWatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch
- MK Access, Nixon The Mission, Polar M600, New Balance RunIQ, Fossil Q, Casio Watches
- Any round or square Android Wear devices up-to 640x640px resolution
- NOT compatible with Gear S, Gear S2, Gear S3 and any Tizen watch


You must have Android Wear app installed on your device. In order to use automatic weather you should have location turned on!
Steps will start counting after midnight! Please allow it to go past midnight to get steps count!
Tapping interactions will only be available if your watch is updated to the latest version of Android Wear (v1.3)!


Don't forget to check our other watches! :)
https://goo.gl/Tr3kjl


If you don't like Qualiss Watch Face please refund or ask for refund. Any low rating without constructive feedback is not helping making this application better.


Please contact us on angcorp.dev@gmail.com for any issue that you may have with Qualiss Watch Face and we'll try to resolve it as soon as possible!
Also let us know what you think of our product in the comment section below :)


Join us on G+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/116734658642174059146
Follow on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wearwatches
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AngCorpDev
comments: It doesn't hold subdial settings after saving them. It always reverts back to default settings even though settings show otherwise.  (ZTE Quartz Wear 2.0)
While it seems to work as expected on AW1.0  one on AW2.0 on the Urbane the day name is off by one (e.g., says Monday on Tuesday)  and as near as I can tell it cannot be fixed.
I really liked this app but the weather but current work. I can update it, but it never shows on the watch?
Nice watch app with color options.
If would be nice to add "pure black" background
recentChanges: - Works as Standalone app with complications
